WVW_SCORE_HELP:
**__WvW Score__**

`gw2!score` - Show the scores of your current WvW match-up.
`gw2!relscore` - Show the overall WvW score of the top world, along with the differences with the worlds on the second and the third place.
`gw2!kd` - Show the kill/death ratio of your current WvW match-up.
WVWSCORE_ERROR: Sorry, the score could not be determined at this time.
